- [About Virtual Campuses](https://digipiedesign.com/about-virtual-campuses/) - About Virtual Campuses A virtual campus is an online hub that reproduces many of the interactions and co-working and learning environments of a physical school or office. Users can attend classes, collaborate, ask questions, speak publicly or privately with co-workers and peers, meet friends, and relax with fun activities between meetings. Our campuses are virtual
